name: Net of Snaring
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic Items/Specific Cursed Items/Net of Snaring

sections.body: This net provides a +3 bonus on attack rolls but can only be used underwater. Underwater, it can be commanded to shoot forth up to 30 feet to trap a creature. If thrown on land, it changes course to target the creature that threw it.
